name: Space Wahou
description:
A2 IIM Student game.

Programmers:
- Julien Quentin
- Alex Copin
- Vincent BOUTIN

You're controlling a mothership which must survive and kill its enemies. Collect blue little ships to increase your defense and your firepower. Green pills will restore your health, yellow ones will charge your ultimate weapon.

ZQSD to move.
Right click to shoot.
"A" to change weapon.

Music :
